name: Dawnlands
description:
Create your own epic adventure! Indulge yourself in the stunning open-world NOW!

EXPLORE


A variety of biomes, relics, puzzles dot the landscape... An ancient land that has laid dormant for centuries is waiting for you to awaken it, and all new stories are waiting for you to pen.

SURVIVE


When all has vanished, all but rich natural resources that can be found all over the land. What matters is how you use them. Start from the very beginning and survive on your own!

BUILD


Collect all the materials you need in the world, design and build your dream home!

COOPERATE


Go alone or group up with other warriors and enjoy the journey together!

CHALLENGE


Potential dangers don't give up their areas easily. You need to find and defeat the darkness before it engulfs the land because you were fated to be the chosen savior of the world.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For those looking to dive deeper into the game, item purchases and battle passes are available via in-game purchase.
